Description: Enjoy this spacious 2 levels of living space. The first floor has hardwood floors throughout, a living room with tons of shelf storage, a beautiful eat in kitchen, full bathroom, and access to your large private deck. The lower floor boasts 2 bedrooms with huge closet space and another full bathroom. Lastly, your own washer and dryer steps away from your unit. Central AC is the cherry on top. No smoking! Good credit a must. First month rent, security deposit half month, and broker fee required. For showings please call: Zachary Phone: c.Dependable Real Estate
